features: Contains 1- 16 ounce bottle of Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Dual Replacement Therapy for use as body lotion to replenish and moisturize
Adamia naturally mimics skin’s own oils allowing it to be absorbed faster and without that undesirable greasy residue
Dermatologist Tested and Recommended, Clinically Proven - our repair body lotion moisurizes distressed skin, and repairs and treats dry skin, skins tears, and more

The formula is non messy, non-greasy, fragrance free, paraben free, non-allergenic, cruelty free, petroleum-free, vegan friendly, soy free, no gmo ingredients, and gluten free. It also easily absorbs onto skin
Formulated with our exclusive dual replacement therapy: pure macadamia oil, rich in omega-7 and the most soothing and effective moisturizers science has to offer
Adāmia Therapeutic Repair Lotion penetrates below the skin’s surface to replace depleted oils
body.description: Find relief with Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with promega-7. It's the best of science and nature, a blend of proven moisturizers and nature's own natural remedy, macadamia oil. The oil that most closely mimics skin's own oils resulting in exceptional absorption and hydration. Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion features our exclusive blend of promega-7 including pure macadamia oil, rich in omega-7, and the most soothing and effective moisturizers science has to offer. Dermatologist tested, fragrance free, non-allergenic, paraben free, cruelty free, petroleum free, vegan friendly, soy free, no gmo ingredients, gluten free and non-greasy

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It all began with a philosophy of caring and a tree We love quieting hurting skin. We love that we do it with a natural remedy infused with good science. And we especially love that every day we have an opportunity to make someone’s life better. Science plus Nature Hurting Skin Restored Relief is finally in your hands. Adāmia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Promega-7. An expert blend of the best hydration science has to offer and nature’s own remedy, macadamia oil. The natural oil that closely mimics skin’s own oils resulting in exceptional absorption and hydration. So go ahead, liberally apply to skin. Distress is quieted. Hurts heal. And now one more thing is right in your world. Penetrates below the skin’s surface to replace depleted oils. The most soothing and effective moisturizer science has to offer

When skin hurts, life hurts Inspired by the natural healing properties found in macadamia oil, our skin therapy line of products repair, restore and strengthen your body’s most vulnerable layer. Hurting skin interrupts life... ...and nowhere is it more evident than among our aging population. We know because for years, we’ve been consistently caring for those patients, family and friends, whose skin is in need of a solution. Quiet hurting skin People with slow wound healing and scarring will know nothing works as well as Adāmia for people who struggle with slow wound healing and scarring. Use it as soon as possible when you get a skin tear. It helps the healing process and minimizes the appearance of scars. You will love it so much, you’ll use it over your whole body. We found the solution in the macadamia tree A tree simple in natural beauty but complex in its skin-health benefits. Because macadamia oil is most like skin’s natural oils, it penetrates like no other lotion to restore health to skin and peace to living.

Macadamia Nut Macadamia nut oil, nature’s remedy, contains more omega-7 than any other nut oil, and closely resembles human sebum, allowing it to mimic skin’s natural oil production resulting in exceptional absorption for superior moisturization.

Promega-7 The best of science and nature is the foundation of our profound skin therapy known as Promega-7. It is an exclusive blend of pure macadamia oil, rich in omega-7, and the most soothing and effective moisturizers science has to offer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great body lotion. Not greasy
reviews.reviewText: Dry flaky skin. Best body lotion I’ve ever used

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product actually does what it claims. It has greatly reduced the number of unsightly age and blemish spots on my skin. My skin is softer and supple once again. No hiding unsightly spots any longer. I use it everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The best I've found yet!
reviews.reviewText: I live in Minnesota, where it gets really dry in the Winter, AND have radiant heat, which really lowers the humidity. This leads to severely dry skin; so much so that I often find myself scratching myself until my dry, cracked skin bleeds.I have tried most OTC moisturizers, and the best I'd found before now was Gold Bond Diabetic Dry Skin Relief. But it seems to not work as well as it used to (is ANYTHING better since the pandemic?); it didn't absorb well, just sitting on top of my skin and leaving a layer of lotion.My next door neighbour recommended Adamia Therapeutic Repair lotion, and gave me a sample to try.I have to say that it is the best thing yet! It absorbs readily, feels amazing, and keeps the painful and infuriating itching down "to a dull roar," as my father used to say.Unlike some reviewers here, I'm not looking for it to make my skin look younger, just to make the itching at least manageable, and it does that pretty well. If you suffer (and I mean SUFFER, not just "have") from really dry skin, I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Moisturizer - A staple in our home
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased this lotion several times for my husband and elderly In-Laws. This is very nice lotion. A bit greasy at first, but soaks in nicely after a few minutes. Does not stain clothes. The fragrance is good for men or women, young or old. Very subtle and not perfumey at all. My husband had hand surgery earlier this year and his PT asked what he was using on his scar tissue because it was nicely hydrated and softer than most scar tissue. He told her it was Adamia Repair Lotion and showed her a photo of the bottle on his phone on his next visit. She was very impressed with the healing quality. One bottle lasts quite a while. Try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is supposed to lighten or remove those awful red marks on arms of us older women. Just finished 1 bottle. It Is a good moisturizer , but haven’t seen any other improvement while using twice a day. Will be starting 2nd bottle soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works better than advertised!
reviews.reviewText: I bought Adamia to help heal bruises on my 75 year old arms. In 2 days the bruises were visibly lighter. In 7 days they were almost gone. I’ve been using it every day and my skin doesn’t seem to bruise as easily as before. I’ve also had rough cracked heels for years, even though I used various lotions and creams, including Cera-ve. Three weeks of Adamia applications have almost completely restored my feet. Reviews on Amazon gave me hope that this product was different than the rest. When I tell my fellow oldsters about Adamia they just roll their eyes because they think there’s no hope for old skin. You have nothing to lose if you buy on Amazon with free return. This product is Awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion may be a bit pricey but it definitely works as advertised! Been using since May '23 and I can see a difference in my mature skin. It's not greasy, no overpowering scent. Well worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cream really works. I'm glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Crepey Wrinkly skin? You Need This
reviews.reviewText: Ok. 👯👯👯👯👯 This lotion is a must have if you have wrinkly or crepey skin on your arms. I am 60 years old and noticed crepey skin on my inner arms last year but because I was healing from surgery, I just shrugged it off thinking, bah, I’ll get my arms back in shape when I can. Moving forward, and a year later, I need 2 more surgeries and looking at my arms, horrified me. Thinking what have I done and more importantly, what can I do? Amazon search. Because of all the great reviews, I purchased this cream and OMG!! For me, it’s life changing. It’s absolutely amazing, and honestly, it’s been only 4 days of applying it 3 times a day…liberally. The wrinkly, crepes are minimal (almost gone) I am so happy, and confident now, I am wearing all my sleeveless summer dresses, and am dumbfounded at the incredible results. I put this cream EVERYWHERE. Forehead to my toes and quickly and greedily, ordered 2 more bottles. Never, ever have I liked a lotion so much. It works! I am over-the-moon happy. It is my fountain of youth, and puts a smile on my face as I’m applying it! Thank you, thank you. Thank you so much. 💕🌸💗💞🌷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I waited till I had used it all not impressed at all will not be buying again

reviews.reviewTitle: I don't see much of a difference with my skin
reviews.reviewText: I don't see much of a difference in my skin
Great product for sensitive skin! Arrived on time.
While the lotion applies well, is non greasy & soaks into the skin well, it has not yet repaired or strengthened my painful, damaged skin.
